CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 26, 1961, pg. 1, reads: "'Trick' Nabs Lady - Seen as she prepared to accompany three patrolmen to Station 2, following arrest at 2150 Bedford Ave., for operating a numbers game, is Lucille Hatcher, 37, of 521 Landleis Pl.  Cops found no evidence, but her sale of '248' to a dime buyer, two hours  previously, led to her arrest and commitment to stand trial, following a Wednesday hearing at Station 1. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lucille Hatcher at door with police officer, after her arrest for operating numbers game, surrounded by onlookers including boy on bicycle, in front of auto supply store, 2150 Bedford Avenue, Hill District
